content: *keep your little one properly bundled in the colder months with this lacy baby bunting lionbrand com * lion brand pattern # 60650ad skill level intermediate size newborn finished chest buttoned 28 in 71 cm finished length 20 in 51 cm #270 lion cashmere blend 672 yards *discontinued yarn aran weight yarn may be substituted * crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm split ring stitch markers 5 buttons 1/2 in 13 mm diameter gauge 3 pattern repeats = 7 in 18 cm in pattern stitch with larger hook pattern multiple of 10 sts + 1 pieces back left front right front 2 sleeves
